data.title: John Grose Obituary - Napanee, Ontario
data.meta_description: Wartman Funeral Homes in Kingston Ontario serves Napanee and Kingston providing burial, cremation, memorial services, receptions and pre arrangements.
data.text:
Grose; John Oliver - At the Lennox & Addington County General Hospital in Napanee on Monday, November 14, 2011 following a brief illness, in his 77th year. Beloved husband of Ruth (nee Bray) and cherished father of David Grose (Diane) and Barb McEwen (William), all of Napanee. Loving grandfather of Kaitlyn & Emily Grose and Geoffrey, Connie & Amy McEwen. Survived by his brother James (Margaret) and sisters Margaret Burgess (Leslie) and Dinah Brazendale (late Gerald), all of England. Remembered fondly by his extended family, many friends and especially the Napanee Lions Club where John has been a member for many years. A Memorial Service will be held at St. Mary Magdalene Anglican Church (137 Robinson St, Napanee) on Saturday, November 19, 2011 at 2 p.m., with the Lions Memorial Service at 1:30 p.m. Donations by cheque to the Diabetes Association or the L&A Hospital Foundation will be remembered with appreciation by the family. Arrangements entrusted to the Wartman Funeral Home "Napanee Chapel" (613-354-3722)

For Donations Online: Please click on the contact us button below and provide the following: Name of Deceased, Name of Charity of Choice, Amount of Donation, Your Full Name, Full Address, Phone number, Method of Payment (i.e. Cheque Payable to the Charity of Choice and mailed to the Funeral Home, or Credit Card information including expiry date).
